tool_description: Estimates time, materials, and costs required for maintenance work orders based on historical data and work complexity.

work_order_id.description: Work order to estimate resources for

work_category.description: Category of work: electrical, plumbing, hvac, mechanical, structural, cleaning, landscaping

complexity_level.description: Work complexity: simple, moderate, complex, major

include_materials.description: Whether to include material cost estimates

labor_rate_category.description: Labor rate category: apprentice, standard, senior, specialist

urgency_multiplier.description: Urgency cost multiplier (1.0-3.0) for rush jobs

error_messages: Work order not found: The provided work_order_id does not exist.
Invalid work category: Use one of [electrical, plumbing, hvac, mechanical, structural, cleaning, landscaping].
Invalid complexity level: Use one of [simple, moderate, complex, major].
Invalid labor rate category: Use one of [apprentice, standard, senior, specialist].
Invalid urgency multiplier: Value must be between 1.0 and 3.0.
Insufficient scope information: estimated_scope must contain meaningful work description.
usage: Provide work_order_id, work_category, complexity_level, asset_type, and estimated_scope. Optionally configure material/equipment inclusion, labor rates, and urgency factors for accurate resource estimation.

total_estimated_cost.description: Total estimated cost for the work order

confidence_level.description: Confidence level of estimate: low, medium, high

required_tools.description: List of required tools and equipment
